plugins.name: jaan-to
plugins.description: AI-powered plugin with 31 skills for product management, development, WordPress plugin review, release management, UX research, UX flowchart generation, QA testing, data analytics, and evidence-based repo audits. Generate PRDs, user stories, task breakdowns, scaffolds, data models, API contracts, frontend components, test cases, GTM tracking, WordPress PR reviews, changelogs, Mermaid flowcharts, and run detect suite (dev, design, writing, product, UX + knowledge pack). Features: two-phase workflow with human approval, quality-reviewer agent, context-scout agent, LEARN.md continuous improvement system.
